author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Sometimes relationships don't work out because the other person was probably just not ready for a relationship, not because they were a bad person. https://t.co/oPn4s51bZP

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text:
The way some people talk about having children as if we are animals and not humans makes me uncomfortable.

I'm talking about the people who say that our only purpose/goal in life is to "breed" and to "pass on our genes".

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: People who try to "fix" others only end up making their target worse. https://t.co/oPn4s51bZP

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Sometimes the greatest friend groups can fall apart because someone tried to date another person within the friend group and it didn't work out. :/ https://t.co/oPn4s51bZP

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: If someone isn't putting enough effort into a relationship, then perhaps it's because they're dealing with their own personal issues or they like you, but not in that way, so they want to spare your feelings by not telling you that. https://t.co/oPn4s51bZP

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Don't talk crap about your ex and then turn around and date someone who is literally a downgrade from them. https://t.co/oPn4s51bZP

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Some people make good friends, but not good romantic partners. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Nobody OWES you their time to hang out with you just because you asked them to. Sometimes people get caught up with other things that may be out of their control. Appreciate the fact that they even agreed to hang out in the first place because they could've said no. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Just because you're interested in someone doesn't mean that they have to be interested in you back. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Some of y'all come on way too strong and expect way too much out of the people/person that you're interested in, even though you guys probably didn't even know each other for an entire year yet. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Don't befriend or aquainte with someone in the hopes of "fixing" them, especially if they didn't even ask or even imply about it at all. You're just bound to hurt your own feelings. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: It's okay to break up with someone. What's not okay is talking crap about them after the break up, especially if it's unbeknownst to them or publicly out on the Internet. Only do it if the person is genuinely terrible or a criminal. https://t.co/oPn4s4JABf

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: If you're becoming friends with someone with the intention to date them or "fix" them then you're setting yourself up for failure. https://t.co/wmiP8l5twe

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: Teenagers and adults can be platonic friends. It only seems weird/impossible because some of them either have ill intentions or no clear boundaries. https://t.co/wmiP8l5twe

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text: It CAN take a while for us members of the LGBTQ+ to even come to the REALIZATION that we are queer. And if we do, we can still COVER UP the fact that we are queer and we can just say that we're straight so nobody can harass us for it.

author: SamuraiPanda3VAMPS
text:
#billiestansonly (About the queerness, I'm not trying to confirm if Billie's gay or not. This is just a theory.)

Assuming that Billie is gay, just because Billie said that she was straight years ago, doesn't mean that she was being sincere.
